content:
During the last day, the Aviation of Defense forces has struck 9 areas of concentration of personnel, weapons and enemy military equipment.

About thisreportedThe General Staff of the Armed Forces.

Divisions of rocket troops have led to:

  • 3 areas of concentration of personnel,
  • artillery,
  • ammunition composition,
  • 2 enemy air defense.

"At the same time, our warriors continue to be active in the occupation troops of losses in living strength and technology, depleting the enemy along the entire front line," the Armed Forces said.

As reportedArmyinform, on the front - more than 90 battles, most attacks are reflected in the Avdiiv and Novopavlovsky directions.
title: Missile troops have led by ammunition and enemy air defense
description: This was reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces. Divisions of rocket troops have led to: ...
author: Army Inform
